completed.title: CPSV-AP 3.2.0 Compliance

completed.title: DMN Integration
completed.description: Upload, deploy, and test DMN decision models with Operaton rule engine

completed.title: iKnow Integration
completed.description: Import legislative analysis data from iKnow XML exports with configurable field mappings

completed.title: Full Modularization
completed.description: Complete codebase refactoring with hooks, utilities, and DRY principles (-66% code reduction)

completed.title: RPP Architecture Visualization
completed.description: Visual separation of Rules-Policy-Parameters pattern with color-coded tabs and explanatory banners

planned.title: RPP Deep Integration
planned.description: Cross-references between layers: 'This rule implements Policy X', 'This parameter is used by Rules Y, Z', with traceability visualization and impact analysis

planned.title: Extended CPSV-AP Support
planned.description: Add Channel (cv:Channel), Contact Points (cv:ContactPoint), Criteria requirements, and Evidence requirements

planned.title: Multi-Language Support
planned.description: Support for multiple languages beyond Dutch, with language-specific fields and automatic translation workflows

planned.title: Template System
planned.description: Pre-configured templates for common service types (AOW, bijstand, WMO) with quick-start functionality

planned.title: Collaboration Features
planned.description: Real-time collaborative editing, comments, change tracking, and review workflows for team-based service definition

planned.title: Browser Storage Auto-Save
planned.description: Automatic progress saving to localStorage with recovery on browser crash or accidental closure

planned.title: Advanced Validation
planned.description: SHACL-based validation, field-level error messages, real-time validation, and compliance checking

planned.title: Additional Export Formats
planned.description: Export to JSON-LD, RDF/XML, N-Triples, and YAML formats beyond Turtle

planned.title: Version Control Integration
planned.description: Git integration for service versioning, diff viewing, and collaborative development workflows

planned.title: Multi-Service Management
planned.description: Manage multiple services in one session with service catalog, bulk operations, and cross-service references

planned.title: Quality Metrics & Analytics
planned.description: Completeness scores, compliance metrics, usage statistics, and quality dashboards for service definitions

planned.title: Semantic Search
planned.description: Search across services using semantic queries, find related services, and discover reusable components

planned.title: Automated Testing
planned.description: Automated validation tests, regression testing, and CI/CD integration for service definitions

planned.title: TriplyDB Integration
planned.description: Direct publishing to TriplyDB, SPARQL query interface, and linked data exploration

planned.title: User Authentication & Permissions
planned.description: User accounts, role-based access control, organizational workspaces, and audit logging
